text: Hemipilia henryi is an endangered species of plant in the family Orchidaceae native to the Hubei and Sichuan provinces of China.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China v 25 p 98, 裂唇舌喙兰 lie chun she hui lan, Hemipilia henryi Rolfe, Bull. Misc. Inform. Kew. 1896: 203. 1896. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Hemipilia henryi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Hubei Category:Flora of Sichuan Category:Endemic orchids of China henryi Category:Endangered plants Category:Plants described in 1896 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hemipilia henryi
